title: BRICK
description:
BRICK (Brix hack), 1990

A modified version of BRIX, a CHIP-8 game. Original BRIX by Andreas Gustafsson. This one is a solid wall; no air between bricks! 4, 6 - left/right

title: SPACE INVADERS
description:
Space Invaders (1978), by David Winter

The well known game. Destroy the invaders with your ship. Shoot with 5, move with 4 and 6. Press 5 to begin a game.
